$:/plugins/gera2ld/prism/readme.text:
This is a TiddlyWiki plugin for syntax highlight with PrismJS.

Make sure [[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/highlight]] is disabled, otherwise this plugin may not work.

[[Source code|https://github.com/gera2ld/tw-prism]]

[[Demo|https://gera2ld.github.io/tw-prism/]]
